entry_get_all_query.name: query
entry_get_all_query.description: Search - Item to search for in haystack (column)

entry_search_quality.name: quality
entry_search_quality.description:
Range or Comma separated values
Could be common terms: 4K, UHD
Vertical pixels: 1080, 1080p
Range: 1080p to UHD

entry_search_date.name: date
entry_search_date.description:
Could be a date or date range: '{date}', '{date} to {date}', 'from {date} to {date}';
Comparators: '> 2024-10-20', '>= 2024', 'gt 2024-10-20', 'gte 2024', 'greater than 2024-10', 'greater than or equal 2024-10-20'

entry_search_filesize.name: filesize
entry_search_filesize.description:
Could be common terms or byte value: '3 GB', 3000000000
Comparators: '> 3 GB'

entry_search_encoder.name: encoder
entry_search_encoder.description: This searches / matches for all Video, Audio, Sub Encoders

entry_search_release.name: release
entry_search_release.description:
Could be absolute: spring, 2020, 'spring 2020'
Range: '2020 to 2021', 'summer 2020 to spring 2021', '2020 summer to 2022'
Comparators: '> spring 2023'

entry_search_rating.name: rating
entry_search_rating.description:
Max value should be 10
Could be absolute value: 3
Range: 5 to 10
Comparators < 7

entry_search_codec_video.name: codec_video
entry_search_codec_video.description: Comma separated IDs of video codecs

entry_search_codec_audio.name: codec_audio
entry_search_codec_audio.description: Comma separated IDs of audio codecs

entry_search_watcher.name: watcher
entry_search_watcher.description: ID of watcher (null = any, 0 = null in DB)

entry_search_titles_id.name: id
entry_search_titles_id.description: Entry ID, search should by default include this entry

entry_search_titles_id_excluded.name: id_excluded
entry_search_titles_id_excluded.description: If true, id parameter is exluded instead of included

entry_search_titles_needle.name: needle
entry_search_titles_needle.description: Search query; When blank is passed, get 10 alphanumerically arranged titles

token.description: Login with email and password to get the authentication token
token.name: Authorization
